title: YouTube now shows when creators are live streaming with a ring around the profile picture
content:
In an effort to shine more of a spotlight on its active creators, YouTube is adding a new feature that highlights when a creator goes live by adding a ring around their profile picture.

more…

The post YouTube now shows when creators are live streaming with a ring around the profile picture appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: YouTube is updating its mobile app to show a ring that highlights when a creator has live content on their channel, similar to TikTok.
